Feature.Name: Horseshoes of Speed
Feature.Text: These iron horseshoes come in a set of four. While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creature, they increase the creature's walking speed by 30 feet.

MagicProperty.Name: Horseshoes of Speed
MagicProperty.Description: These iron horseshoes come in a set of four. While all four shoes are affixed to the hooves of a horse or similar creature, they increase the creature's walking speed by 30 feet.
